entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 26 Oct 2023 08:03:34
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Morgan Stanley names Ted Pick as next CEO, ending race to succeed James Gorman
- How to find a lost phone in a no-cell-coverage camping site?
- How AI and Blockchain are fighting counterfeiting in the luxury market
- Facebook parent Meta Platforms extends winning streak for social media advertising in Q3
- ChatGPT's Scary Good at Getting People to Click Phishing Emails, IBM Finds

Business:
- Speaker of the House finally elected, ending three weeks of leaderless chaos
- Know the price-matching policies for Best Buy, Target, Walmart, and others
- Carta's CEO reaches out to customers about bad press, alerting them to bad press
- Banks that lent Elon Musk money to buy Twitter are totally screwed now
- Meta posts 23% growth as ads rebound, with profit more than doubling

AI:
- How AI and Blockchain are fighting counterfeiting in the luxury market
- ChatGPT's Scary Good at Getting People to Click Phishing Emails, IBM Finds

Other:
- RHOBH's Annemarie Wiley: 5 Things to Know About the Bravo Star
- Clarence Thomas never paid back a $267,230 loan from a rich friend used to buy a luxury RV, Senate committee finds
- The Little ELF Organizer - Gift Wrapping Made Fun and Easy! by Bryan Perla
- 'Culture of fear': Scientists blast journal that fired its editor for tweeting 'Onion' article on Gaza war
- These 16 lawmakers did not vote for a House resolution supporting Israel after the Hamas attacks
- The San Jose housing market is so competitive that a house with an 'inactive meth lab' is on the market for $1.55 million
- 'When I tried to play, my hand spasmed and shook': why musicians get the yips
- Deluxe Board Game Train Sets: Wave 2 by The Little Plastic Train Company
- The hustle-free way to build a next.js blog with dev.to
- New House speaker Mike Johnson thinks abortion access costs the economy 'able-bodied workers.' Here's why he's wrong
- Recie Allen Wiley Sr. | Obituaries | baycitytribune.com - Bay City Daily Tribune

Insights:
- The tech industry is experiencing leadership changes, with Morgan Stanley appointing Ted Pick as its next CEO and Meta Platforms seeing growth in social media advertising.
- AI and blockchain technologies are being utilized to combat counterfeiting in the luxury market.
- The business landscape is affected by factors such as price-matching policies, customer outreach, and the consequences faced by banks that lent money to Elon Musk.
- The broader topics also touch on various other subjects, including entertainment, politics, housing markets, and personal stories.
- The report highlights the importance of understanding the impact of technology, business decisions, and societal issues on different aspects of life.
